product_name: Maui Jim Cliff House Polarized Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: Lightweight, durable and comfortable, the women's Maui Jim Cliff House Polarized Sunglasses deliver renowned glare protection that comes only from Maui Jim patented Polarized Plus lens technology.
